welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lombard, a charming city known for its idyllic tree-lined streets and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Lombard has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving mainly domestic flights, this terminal offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving flights to and from various countries.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and follow the prompts to connect.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within the United States.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
